Room.Name: Copper Pits - First Level
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the first level of the copper dragon pits.
Room.LongDescription: The pits are carefully guarded by Brownhaven guards to keep just anyone from riding the beautiful copper dragons who live it the pits below. Right now, they are probably sleeping on duty, but you can see an alarm rigged on the entrance to the pits below. If you want to joy ride a dragon, you might have to fight for the privilege.
